ctx: assert (H : (fun n : nat => u (n + N)%nat) = (fun n : nat => u n)).
exceptions.exn: The reference extensionality was not found in the current environment.

original: assert (H : (fun n : nat => u (n + N)%nat) = (fun n : nat => u n)). { extensionality n. f_equal. lia. } rewrite H. apply is_lim_seq_unique. apply Lim_seq_ext. intros n. f_equal. lia.
